DOC.brief_summary: The investigator aim evaluate health benefit physical training per se , weight loss per se exercise-induced weight loss young , overweight men . The investigator hypothesize physical training would independent effect various health parameter ( insulin sensitivity , fast glucose insulin , total abdominal fat mass , waist circumference , blood pressure key muscle protein ) , concomitant weight loss physical activity would increase effect .
DOC.detailed_description: At baseline , intervention week follow intervention participant underwent panel test : - Cardio respiratory fitness - blood pressure - anthropometric measure At baseline intervention hyperinsulinemic , euglycemic clamp perform ass insulin sensitivity . Tissue blood sample also collect analysis : - Total-protein analysis select proteins - Fasting plasma glucose , insulin free fatty acid
DOC.criteria: Overweight ( body mass index 2530 kg/m2 ) Weight stable ( Â±2 kg past 6 month ) Body fat % > 25 % , Maximal oxygen uptake < 45 mL/min/kg Sedentary healthy accord interview Fasting glucose < 6.1 mmol/L Blood pressure < 140/90 mmHg No first degree relative type2diabetes Resistance train Inability meet intervention criterion
